source:
%%sql

-- Build SourceSystem_Fact table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact (
    SourceSystemID,
    Description,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SourceSystemID,
    "SAP HR" AS Description,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate, 
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo

%%sql

-- Build diversity_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim (
    DiversityID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS DiversityID,
    Ethnic_Origin AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
    --COUNT(Ref_NO) AS count
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Ethnic_Origin;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim

%%sql
-- Build disability_dim table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim (
    DisabilityID,
    DisabilityCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS DisabilityID,
    Disability_Text AS DisabilityCode,
    Disability_Code_Description AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, 
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Disability_Text, Disability_Code_Description;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim

%%sql

-- Build religion_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim (
    ReligionID,
    ReligionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS ReligionID,
    Religion AS ReligionCode,
    Religious_Denomination_Key AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Religion, Religious_Denomination_Key;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim

%%sql

-- Build sxo_dim table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim (
    SXOID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SXOID,
    SxO AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, 
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY SxO;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim

%%sql
-- Build secureinfo_fact table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact (
    SecureInfoID,
    DisabilityID,
    DiversityID,
    ReligionID,
    SXOID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SecureInfoID,
    T3.DisabilityID,
    T4.DiversityID,
    T5.ReligionID,
    T6.SXOID, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON (T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode  AND T1.Disability_Code_Description = T3.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T4 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T4.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T5 ON (T1.Religion = T5.ReligionCode  AND T1.Religious_Denomination_Key = T5.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T6 ON T1.SxO = T6.Description
%%sql
select * from odw_standardised_db.addresses

%%sql
-- Build Employee_Dim table 

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim (
    EmployeeID,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    DOB,
    NINumber,
    Gender,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    City,
    County,
    PostCode,
    EmailAddress,
    TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    TelephoneNumberWork,
    PersNumber,
    EmployeeNumber,
    FTE,
    WorkHours,
    PartTimeEmployee,
    EmploymentStatus,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DateToCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    EmployeeGroup,
    AnnualSalary,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT 
    uuid(), --EmployeeID
    T1.First_name as FirstName,
    T1.Last_name as LastName,
    T1.Birth_date as DOB,
    T1.NI_number as NINumber,
    T1.Gender_Key as Gender,
    T2.Street_and_House_Number as AddressLine1,
    T2.`2nd_Address_Line` as AddressLine2,
    T2.District as AddressLine3,
    T2.City as City,
    T2.Region_State_Province_Count as County,
    T2.Postal_Code as PostCode,
    T3.Email_Address as EmailAddress,
    T2.Personal_Mobile as TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    T2.Work_Mobile as TelephoneNumberWork,
    T2.Staff_Number as PersNumber,
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(T1.Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(T1.Pers_No,1,1) = 5 
        THEN concat('00',T1.Pers_No) 
        WHEN LENGTH(T1.Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(T1.Pers_No,1,1) = 4 
        THEN concat('50',T1.Pers_No)
        ELSE T1.Pers_No
    End as EmployeeNumber,
    T1.FTE,
    T1.Wk_hrs as WorkHours,
    T1.`Indicator_Part-Time_Employee` as PartTimeEmployee,
    T1.Employment_Status as EmploymentStatus,
    T1.Civil_Service_Start as CivilServiceStart,
    T1.Date_to_Current_Job as DateToCurrentJob,
    T1.Seniority_Date as SeniorityDate,
    T1.Org_Start_Date as OrgStartDate,
    T1.Fix_Term_End_Date as FixTermEndDate,
    T1.Loan_Start_Date as LoanStartDate,
    T1.Loan_End_Date as LoadEndDate,
    T1.Payroll_Area as PayrollArea,
    T1.Assignment_Number as AssignmentNumber,
    T1.Employee_Group as EmployeeGroup,
    T1.Annual_salary as AnnualSalary,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    null as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestDate,
    null as ValidTo

FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.email T3 ON T2.Staff_Number = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description

%%sql   
-- select count(*)
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
-- LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
-- where T2.Postal_Code IS NOT NULL -- 211 count

-- select count(*)
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.addresses T1 -- 484 count


-- select COUNT(*) --T1.Pers_No, T2.Staff_Number
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
-- INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
-- where T2.Postal_Code IS NOT NULL -- 211 count


-- select T1.Pers_No, T2.Staff_Number
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
-- RIGHT JOIN odw_standardised_db.addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
-- where T1.Pers_No IS NULL


SELECT CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Pers_No) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Pers_No)
            ELSE Pers_No
        End,
        Pers_No
from odw_standardised_db.saphr
--where Pers_No = '421971'
%%sql
SELECT length('Spark SQL ')
%%sql
select * from odw_standardised_db.saphr limit 10

%%sql
-- Build PersonnelArea_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.PersonnelArea_dim (
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelAreaCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT 
    uuid() AS PersonnelAreaID,
    T1.PA AS PersonnelAreaCode,
    First(T1.Personnel_Area) AS Description, 
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.PA

%%sql
-- Build PersonnelSubArea_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.PersonnelSubArea_dim (
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT 
    uuid() AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T1.PSubarea as PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    First(T1.Personnel_Subarea) AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.PSubarea

%%sql
-- Build EmployeeLeavers_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.EmployeeLeavers_dim (
    EmployeeLeaversID,
    EmployeeID,
    ReasonForLeaving,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS EmployeeLeaversID,
    T3.EmployeeID, -- FK to Employee_dim table
    Reason_For_Action AS ReasonForLeaving, 
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.leavers T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.PersNumber;

%%sql
-- Build WorkSchedule_dim table - MISSING CREATING THE TABLE WITH THE py_create_tables_new (Currently not working)

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.WorkSchedule_dim (
    WorkScheduleID,
    WorkScheduleRule,
    WorkWeekDays,
    WorkWeekHours,
    WorkDayHours,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS WorkScheduleID,
    Work_Schedule_Rule AS WorkScheduleRule,
    WkDys AS WorkWeekDays,
    Wk_hrs AS WorkWeekHours,
    Hrs_Day AS WorkDayHours,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) AS SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.absences T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Work_Schedule_Rule, WkDys, Wk_hrs, Hrs_Day ;

/**Select * from odw_harmonised_db.WorkSchedule_dim **/

%%sql
-- Build Specialism_dim table -- CHECK LOGIC
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Specialism_dim (
    SpecialismID,
    EmployeeID,
    Qualification,
    Proficiency,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SpecialismID,
    first(T3.EmployeeID), -- FK to Employee_Dim
    Qualification_Name AS Qualification,
    Proficien AS Proficiency,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) AS SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.specialisms T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Staff_Number = T3.PersNumber
GROUP BY Staff_Number, Qualification_Name, Proficien;

%%sql
-- Build LeaveEntitlement_dim table - MISSING CREATING THE TABLE WITH THE py_create_tables_new (Currently not working)

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.LeaveEntitlement_dim (
    LeaveEntitlementID,
    EmployeeID,
    LeaveDaysPerYear,
    LeaveDeduction,
    LeaveYearStart,
    LeaveYearEnd,
    AbsenceQuotaType,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS LeaveEntitlementID,
    T3.EmployeeID, -- FK to Employee_Dim
    Number AS LeaveDaysPerYear,
    Deduction AS LeaveDeduction,
    Ded_from AS LeaveYearStart,
    Ded_To AS LeaveYearEnd,
    Absence_Quota_type AS AbsenceQuotaType,
    T2.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.leave T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Staff_Number = T3.PersNumber

-- Select * from odw_harmonised_db.LeaveEntitlement_dim

%%sql
-- Build absence_dim table 

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Absence_dim (
    AbsenceID,
    EmployeeID,
    StaffNumber,
    Type,
    SicknessGroup,
    AbsenceStartDate,
    AbsenceEndDate,
    Days,
    CalendarDays,
    WorkScheduleID,
    AnnualLeaveStart,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS AbsenceID,
    T4.EmployeeID,
    T1.Staff_Number as StaffNumber,
    T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type as Type,
    T1.Sickness_Group as SicknessGroup,
    T1.Start_Date as AbsenceStartDate,
    T1.End_Date as AbsenceEndDate,
    T1.Days,
    T1.Cal_Days as CalendarDays,
    T3.WorkScheduleID,
    T1.Annual_Leave_Start AS AnnualLeaveStart,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.absences T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.workschedule_dim T3 ON  T1.Work_Schedule_Rule = T3.WorkScheduleRule AND  
                                                    T1.Wk_hrs = T3.WorkWeekHours AND
                                                    T1.Hrs_Day = T3.WorkDayHours AND
                                                    T1.WkDys = T3.WorkWeekDays
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T4 ON T1.Staff_Number = T4.PersNumber

%%sql
-- Build contract_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim (
    ContractID,
    ContractCode,
    Description,
    ContractTypeCode,
    ContractType,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS ContractID,
    T1.WorkC as ContractCode, 
    First(T1.Work_Contract) as Description,
    T1.CT as ContractTypeCode,
    First(T1.Contract_Type) as ContractType,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1 -- CHECK
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.WorkC, T1.CT

%%sql
-- Build payband_dim table  - table is incorrect

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim (
    PayBandID,
    PSGroupCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS PayBandID,
    PS_Group  AS PSGroupCode,
    First(Pay_Band_Description) AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1 -- CHECK
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.PS_Group

%%sql
-- Build position_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.position_dim (
    PositionID,
    PositionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS PositionID,
    T1.PositionID  AS PositionCode, -- cell AH
    First(PositionName)  AS Description, -- cell AI
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1 -- CHECK
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.PositionID

%%sql
-- Build PINSLocation_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.PINS_Location_dim (
    LocationID,
    LocationCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS LocationID,
    Loc  AS LocationCode, -- check
    First(Location)  AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Loc

%%sql
-- Build OrganisationUnit_dim table  - New table needed

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.OrganisationUnit_dim (
    OrganisationUnitID,
    OrganisationUnit,
    Description,
    OrganisationUnitKey,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS OrganisationUnitID,
    T1.Org_unit as OrganisationUnit,
    T1.Organizational_Unit AS Description,
    T1.Organizational_Key12 AS OrganisationUnitKey,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Org_unit, T1.Organizational_Unit, T1.Organizational_Key12

%%sql
-- Build CostCenter_Dim table  

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim (
    CostCenterID,
    CostCenterCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS CostCenterID,
    T1.Cost_Ctr AS CostCenterCode,
    First(T1.Cost_Centre) AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Cost_Ctr

%%sql
-- Build Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim table  

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim (
    EmployeeHRHierarchyID,
    EmployeeID,
    ManagersEmployeeID,
    CounterSignManagerID, -- join back on first name and last name
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    CONCAT(T5.FirstName,' ', T5.LastName),
    T1.Counter_Sign_Manager,
    uuid() AS EmployeeHRHierarchyID,
    T3.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T4.EmployeeID as ManagersEmployeeID,
    T5.EmployeeID AS CounterSignManagerID,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.PersNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T4 ON T1.Pers_No_2 = T4.PersNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T5 ON T1.Counter_Sign_Manager = CONCAT(T5.FirstName,' ', T5.LastName)
%%sql
Select * from odw_standardised_db.saphr limit 100
